entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
